mapper.select: select u_id, u_name, u_email, NVL(u_point,0) u_point, TO_CHAR(u_signup_date, 'YYYY.MM.DD') as u_signup_date, u_addr, u_tel, u_lvl from mom_user where u_id=#{u_id}

SELECT rownum, b_no, b_title, b_date FROM (SELECT n.b_no as b_no, DECODE(SIGN(LENGTH(b_title)-5),1,SUBSTR(b_title,1,5)||'...',b_title) as b_title, to_char(n.b_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') as b_date FROM normal_board n WHERE n.u_id = #{u_id} ORDER BY n.b_date DESC) WHERE rownum <=4

SELECT rownum, b_no, re_no, re_content, re_date FROM (SELECT n.b_no b_no, n.re_no as re_no, DECODE(SIGN(LENGTH(re_content)-5),1,SUBSTR(re_content,1,5)||'...',re_content) as re_content, to_char(n.re_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') as re_date FROM reply n WHERE n.re_id =#{u_id} ORDER BY n.re_date DESC) WHERE rownum <=4
